api-keys.subtitulo-1: Add your application below to obtain access credentials to our API's
api-keys.subtitulo-sucesso: Your credentials have been generated, now you can consume our API's
api-keys.titulo-sem-chaves: You don't have registered credentials yet
api-keys.subtitulo-sem-chaves: Start registering your credentials to access our API's

cadastro.subtitulo: Create your registration, start your integration journey with us and manage your access credentials.
cadastro.subtitulo-sucesso: Click the 'Sign In' button in the upper right corner and explore our platform!

validacao.email-formato: Please enter a valid email address
validacao.confirmacao-email-formato: Please enter a valid email address

inicio.subtitulo: Explore and automate your processes with the integrations that we have available via API's for you

vantagens.descricao: Our main objective is to bring agility and security in the integration of systems with our partners, come and discover our platform.

seguranca.descricao: Data is transferred with a high level of security, applying the best practices in our environment

dados-tempo-real.descricao: You receive the information as soon as the data is updated in our systems, making available data that reflects the current reality of certain processes.

estrategia.descricao: Our data can help you make better strategic decisions in your organization, we are providing you in a consolidated way, the information necessary to perform this task.

customizacao.descricao: We offer you several integrations that can help your business, however, we understand the particularities of each partner and we are willing to analyze and implement to integrate what you need.

automacao.descricao: We know the benefits of automating processes, so we can bring more agility through our integrations.

documentacao.descricao: We have a detailed documentation of each endpoint that we make available, we believe that in this way the partner has the necessary information to integrate with our API's

preco.titulo-superior: Find the plan that best fits your business
preco.subtitulo-2: Check the features of each plan
